mapper.update: update COM_DATASOURCE set DEL_FLG = '1' where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into COM_DATASOURCE (PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, IMPL_CLASS, MODEL) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{implClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update COM_DATASOURCE set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRT_USER = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPL_CLASS = #{implClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, IMPL_CLASS, MODEL from COM_DATASOURCE where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, IMPL_CLASS, MODEL from COM_DATASOURCE order by NAME asc

select A.PK_ID, A.NAME, A.DESCRIPTION, A.TYPE, A.NOTE, A.DEL_FLG, A.CRT_USER, A.CRT_TIME, A.UPT_USER, A.UPT_TIME, A.IMPL_CLASS, A.MODEL from COM_DATASOURCE A where A.DEL_FLG = '0' and A.MODEL = #{model} order by A.NAME asc

select GFD.* from T_GF_DICT GFD left join COM_DATASOURCE CD on GFD.DICT_TYPE_ID = 'IM_MODEL_PROPS_'||CD.TYPE where CD.PK_ID = #{sourceId} and exists ( select 1 from T_GF_DICT GF where (GF.DICT_TYPE_ID = 'IM_DS_SOURCE_REALTIME_TYPE' or GF.DICT_TYPE_ID = 'IM_DS_SOURCE_BATCH_TYPE') and GF.DICT_ID = CD.TYPE )

select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, IMPL_CLASS, MODEL from COM_DATASOURCE CD where CD.DEL_FLG = '0' and CD.MODEL = 'IM' and exists ( select 1 from T_GF_DICT GF where (GF.DICT_TYPE_ID = 'IM_DS_SOURCE_REALTIME_TYPE' or GF.DICT_TYPE_ID = 'IM_DS_SOURCE_BATCH_TYPE') and GF.DICT_ID = CD.TYPE ) order by NAME asc
select * from T_GF_DICT GF left join COM_DATASOURCE CD on CD.TYPE = GF.DICT_ID where GF.DICT_TYPE_ID = 'IM_DS_SOURCE_REALTIME_TYPE' and CD.PK_ID = #{sourceId}

select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, IMPL_CLASS, MODEL from COM_DATASOURCE CD where CD.DEL_FLG = '0' and CD.MODEL = 'IM' and exists ( select 1 from T_GF_DICT GF where GF.DICT_TYPE_ID = 'IM_MODEL_ENGINE_TYPE' and GF.DICT_ID = CD.TYPE ) order by NAME asc
